scripts.build:nunjucks: mkdir -p dist/pages dist/views && cd src/pages && find . -name '*.njk' -exec sh -c 'mkdir -p ../../dist/pages/$(dirname {}) && cp {} ../../dist/pages/{}' \; && cd ../views && find . -name '*.njk' -exec sh -c 'mkdir -p ../../dist/views/$(dirname {}) && cp {} ../../dist/views/{}' \;
